p: Considering the results presented in the Figs 3 and 4, the supplementation with EPA-rich oil disturbed the MMP-9 and TIMP-1 balance, impairing the collagen organization. This effect seems to be related with IL-10, since the IL-10 −/− mice supplemented with EPA-rich oil reestablished the collagen organization and no alterations in MMP-9 concentrations were observed.
